body:
> Your own source says 69% If you’re going to cite a statistic, at least cite the right one. Otherwise, what’s the point?

That's literally 1% away from 70%, are you really trying to play this game?

> That’s not even a reason that your source gives.

I cited statistics, not their conjecture which is different from mine. It's just hyperfeminist evil men bullshit, but the numbers aren't lying; sexists also complain that women divorce a lot to "prove" that all women are awful whores and sluts (even though men would be just as guilty and probably more so).

> You said that women are less likely to get married than men and I showed that that’s statistically false.

No, I said men have a bigger need to marry than women, not that they're more successful at doing so.

That's literally 1% away from 70%, are you really trying to play this game?

I cited statistics, not their conjecture which is different from mine. It's just hyperfeminist evil men bullshit, but the numbers aren't lying; sexists also complain that women divorce a lot to "prove" that all women are awful whores and sluts (even though men would be just as guilty and probably more so).

You said that women are less likely to get married than men and I showed that that’s statistically false.

No, I said men have a bigger need to marry than women, not that they're more successful at doing so.

body:
Nope, I was an only child, both parents still married, and they raised me the typical way you raise a boy. This was not their doing. And oddly enough this doesn't run in my family either.

I think whatever part of my brain controls reproductive desire is either missing or severely underdeveloped. This is probably a side effect of ASD. All my life I never understood why so many boys were obsessed with getting hurt and beating each other up, and winning at boring af sports. It hurt and it wasn't any fun. And I didn't get what was so bad about being made fun of for having introverted hobbies or stepping outside of the extremely narrow male archetype.

And only recently did I find out why: *because that's how they impress girls*, another thing I was never concerned about. Consciously or not, males are driven to compete and act alpha because it increases their chances of winning a female to have sex with. This alone explains 99% of the social expectations and biological urges for men, because they are the ones who have to compete to impress the ladies and not the other way around. I also found out that men are supposed to have an instinctual desire to physically pass a copy of their genes to another generation, which just sounds silly to me. This is the only reason men are okay with nature and society making their lives suck so much, because they get off to it.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

parent.body:
Politics at its most basic definition is simply the way we relate to our neighbors. So is religion. It's the way we love god and our neighbors as ourselves. 

Now, you can say that mainstream politics is corrupt, and so being a part of that politics is un-Christian. But that's not all 'politics,' and you can't simply ban discussing how we relate to our neighbors in Christianity, lol.

post.body:
The amount of people in their early and mid twenties who use tiktok and act like edgy emotional 16 year olds is seriously depressing. Whats worse is that this behavior is most concentrated in academia and others supposed places of "enlightenment" because modern academia attracts lots of emotionally stunted people afraid of "adulting" without a nanny system to insulate them. 

When I was surrounded by social media and internet game obsessive people, I always coped by telling myself I’d find more mature and well-rounded people in college/gradschool/career, but it seems like the window for acting like an adult child is stretching wider and wider. No matter how much I advance, I am surrounded by social degeneracy. It’s tiresome.

body:
Does a falling tree make a sound if no one is there to hear it? Is the television really playing if you're not there to see it? In the same way even considering that we are mostly biological machines, someone has to embody them for you to experience it, otherwise it would be dead and soulless, like a computer.

And another question, where did the universe come from? The Big Bang maybe, but where did that come from? It can't just suddenly exist with nothing causing it.
body_html:
Does a falling tree make a sound if no one is there to hear it? Is the television really playing if you're not there to see it? In the same way even considering that we are mostly biological machines, someone has to embody them for you to experience it, otherwise it would be dead and soulless, like a computer.

And another question, where did the universe come from? The Big Bang maybe, but where did that come from? It can't just suddenly exist with nothing causing it.

parent.body:
Because I'm not a religiouscel. I can't technically prove that there's no god/afterlife, but its highly unlikely.

We only exist inside our brains and when the brain dies we cease to exist. We cannot physically imagine nothingness because of our brains defense mechanism. 

We think of nothingness like sitting in a quiet dark room. But thats still something. God is a man-made concept and cannot exist outside of ourselves. 

God is a made up coping mechanism for humans to deal with the indifference of the universe and our own mortality. Also for exploiting lesser beings. Kings would claim to have direct communication with God so they were all knowing and everybody had to listen to their orders.

I dont mean to upset you but thats how I look at it. I literally stopped believing in God when I found out Santa Claus and the Easter bunny weren't real.

parent.body:
Funny how a century ago some women took great pride in their husbands being violent toward them. Not saying I approve, but some of the stories I have read of women begging their husbands to take hold of them and bruise them, then crying when they instead apologize for a perceived slight, is like being in the twilight zone. I didn't catch who was singing this morning but while listening to the 40s channel on my Sirius XM the woman was singing about how her man hit her and she liked it and anyone who thought differently had no right to say anything. Some of the stories I have read indicated that the anger and passion required for a man to strike his woman was a sign that he loved her while his being a wet noodle meant there was no spark of passion!

Sometimes truth is stranger than fiction.

post.title: “Chivalry - a romantic idealism closely related to Christianity, which makes honor the guiding principle of conduct. Connected with this is the ancient concept of the gentleman.” - Richard M. Weaver
